attributes.action: Start listening to the people of his country, Stop providing spin answers, Reduce Fuel Duty!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page15412.asp

The above link is an official response from the Prime Minister's office!

It explains something that we have had drilled into our heads by the Government for far too long! 

We are not questioning the reasoning behind Fuel Duty, Nor are we asking for clarification of its existence!!!

We are the people of this country who have elected the Prmie Minister to run the country how WE want it to be run.

We live in a democracy and we the people of the UK say ENOUGH! 

We are not going to be dictated to any longer being told this IS what you pay, so either remove or significantly reduce fuel duty.

Commuters suffering.
Businesses forced to close.
Traffic at an all time high.
Car emmissions lower through improved technologies within the vehicles, not because of a higher duty.

Just 4 very good reasons as to why you should sign this petition.

Because the people of this Democracy demand it!

Just 1 as to why the government should act upon it.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
